        Updates an unit's position
        Specified by:
        update in class Unit
        Parameters:
        dir_x - where the unit is moving in the x-plane
        dir_y - where the unit is moving in the y-plane
        delta - frames per second passed since last update
        block_l - left tile
        block_u - upper tile
        block_r - right tile
        block_d - down tile

        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
